trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Prescott
There were no other sightings in Prescott on or around April 13th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsStargazing on a very clear night - sighted 5 lights, yellow color, flashing on and off in random sequence. If one solid object, lights would have formed a massive boomerang shape. Could not see any solid object between lights. Object was moving slowly and silently in a slight bank. Unable to ascertain distance, speed, or exact size but appeared to be very large. Object was moving from the north. Object vanished after about a minute (all lights went out). I have lived near airports all my life and am very acquainted with all aircraft - this was not any aircraft I have ever seen or heard of. Seemed very similar to the Phoenix Lights.
